lead_paragraph: Has the Oscar horse race developed a leader of the herd? On Saturday the Directors Guild of America awarded its top prize to Kathryn Bigelow for “The Hurt Locker,” the Iraq war drama that also took the best film honors from the Producers Guild a week before.
